introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: At Moun Digital Agency, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.text: We collect the following types of information:

items.emailDesc: when you subscribe to our newsletter or submit a contact form
items.contactDesc: including name, phone number, and company details when you fill out our contact forms
items.usageDesc: such as IP address, browser type, and pages visited

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.text: We use the collected information for:

items.respond: Responding to your inquiries and providing customer support
items.newsletter: Sending newsletters and marketing communications (only if you've subscribed)

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. Your data is stored securely and is only accessible to authorized personnel.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.text: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. We may share your data with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, provided they agree to keep this information confidential.

items.access: Access the personal data we hold about you
items.delete: Request deletion of your personal data
items.unsubscribe: Unsubscribe from our newsletter at any time

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: Our website may use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect the functionality of certain features.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

hero.title: We turn your ideas into unique websites
hero.subtitle: Quickly, efficiently, reliably

onePageWebsite.title: One-Page Website
onePageWebsite.description: A modern, sleek single-page site to showcase your product or service. Perfect for a fast launch and focused online presence.

onlineStore.title: Online Store
onlineStore.description: Turn visitors into buyers with a fully functional online store. Manage products easily and sell around the clock.

portfolioSite.title: Portfolio/Business Card Site
portfolioSite.description: Present your skills or services professionally. Ideal for freelancers, creatives, and businesses wanting to make a strong first impression.

customProgram.title: Custom Program/Script
customProgram.description: Get a tailored program or script built for your specific needs ‚Äî automation, data collection, integrations, and more.

landingPage.title: Landing Page
landingPage.description: High-converting landing page designed to grab attention and drive action. Great for marketing campaigns and product launches.

customWebsite.title: Custom Website
customWebsite.description: A fully customized website built around your brand, goals, and audience. Unique design and responsive across all devices.

skilledTeam.title: Skilled Team
skilledTeam.description: Our developers have hands-on experience across 20+ industries. We provide tested, practical solutions tailored to your specific business goals ‚Äî from startups to large enterprises.

tailoredSolutions.title: Tailored Solutions
tailoredSolutions.description: Every project starts with research and competitor analysis. We create a personalized strategy that fits your brand, audience, and market.

realWorldExperience.title: Real-World Experience
realWorldExperience.description: With over 100 completed projects, we've delivered results in real estate, e-commerce, logistics, healthcare, and more. We build what works ‚Äî not just what looks good.

alwaysEvolving.title: Always Evolving
alwaysEvolving.description: We stay ahead of trends by constantly learning and applying the latest technologies, ensuring your solution stays relevant in a fast-changing digital world.

transparentProcess.title: Transparent Process
transparentProcess.description: With 2+ years in digital strategy, we deliver clear reports, open communication, and measurable results. You always know what you're getting ‚Äî and why it works.

smartTechnology.title: Smart Technology
smartTechnology.description: We use modern tools and data-driven methods to supercharge your marketing, optimize performance, and help your business grow faster.

ourApproach.title: Our Effective Approach
ourApproach.subtitle: Steps that help you create a project without unnecessary stress

websiteCreation.title: Website creation with unique UX/UI design
websiteCreation.description: We develop modern, visually appealing websites with a focus on usability and conversion. Your brand will stand out and your users will enjoy a seamless experience on any device.

seoOptimization.title: SEO optimization
seoOptimization.description: We optimize your website for search engines, ensuring high rankings and organic traffic growth. Our SEO strategies help your business get discovered by your target audience.

promotionSetup.title: Setup and launch of promotion
promotionSetup.description: We create and manage advertising campaigns across Google, Facebook, Instagram, and other platforms to attract new customers and boost your online presence.

salesGrowth.title: Sales and leads growth
salesGrowth.description: We help you increase sales and leads, while reducing advertising costs and scaling results from your marketing investments.

technicalSupport.title: Technical support and updates
technicalSupport.description: We provide ongoing technical support, regular updates, and quick troubleshooting to keep your website running smoothly and securely.

analyticsReporting.title: Analytics and reporting
analyticsReporting.description: We track key metrics and provide clear, actionable reports so you can see your progress and make informed business decisions.

presentation.title: Discover Our Full Story
presentation.description: Want to learn more about MOUN Digital Agency? Download our complete presentation with detailed information about our services, portfolio, and success stories.

ourStack.title: Development technologies we work with
ourStack.subtitle: The power of code is in our developers' hands

discuss.title: Let's discuss your project
discuss.subtitle: Share your ideas with our experts and get a free consultation on your digital solution

workStages.title: Important stages
workStages.subtitle: of the beginning of half-time work
workStages.description: Steps to help create a stress-free project

introduction.title: Introduction and initial briefing
introduction.description: We'll start with a discovery call to dive into your goals, ideas, and expectations ‚Äî this helps us understand the big picture from the start.

audit.title: Audit & Business Analysis
audit.description: If you already have a website, we'll analyze it along with your niche and competitors to identify what can be improved and what will set you apart.

proposal.title: Tailored Proposal
proposal.description: Based on all insights and your completed brief, we'll provide a clear estimate for time, budget, and the best solution for your business.

planning.title: Project Planning & Agreement
planning.description: We'll sign a detailed agreement that outlines all key stages, timelines, and payment terms ‚Äî so you know exactly what to expect.

development.title: Design & Development
development.description: You'll get regular updates throughout the process. We'll share progress, gather your feedback, and adjust based on your vision.

launch.title: Testing & Launch
launch.description: Once development is complete, we'll run full testing to ensure everything works smoothly. Then we launch and hand over full access with clear instructions.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about website development

developmentTime.question: How long does it take to create a website?
developmentTime.answer: Development time depends on project complexity. A simple landing page can be ready in 1-2 weeks, while a complex e-commerce site may take 1-2 months.

developmentStages.question: What are the website development stages?
developmentStages.answer: Development includes: requirements analysis, design mockup creation, layout, functionality programming, testing, content filling, and project launch.

maintenanceSupport.question: Do you provide website maintenance services?
maintenanceSupport.answer: Yes, we provide a full range of technical support services: content updates, backups, security monitoring, and technical issue resolution.

technologiesUsed.question: What technologies do you use?
technologiesUsed.answer: We work with modern technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, Nest.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL and many others depending on project needs.

projectChanges.question: Can I make changes to the project during development?
projectChanges.answer: Absolutely! We are always open to client changes and suggestions. It's important to discuss changes in advance so they don't affect timelines and budget.

quote.text: Together with us, let's elevate your project to MOUN. Ready to take the step?
